JobMotolink.motolinkDescription: A WebApplication which connects the best companies to the fastest delivery boys on the market

AboutMeSection.description: Natural from Rio de Janeiro, you can call me Isa. True to the cliché, I love going to the beach. I love cooking and reading books. I enjoy staying in my own space, but I also appreciate moments of extroversion.

StacksSection.aboutMyStacks: As a Full Stack Developer, I try to keep up with the most used languages, frameworks, and libraries, focusing on being as comprehensive as possible to deliver not only stunning but useful solutions

ContactSection.contactCTA: LET’S TALK? - GET IN TOUCH - DON’T BE SHY - WANNA HAVE A COFFEE? -
ContactSection.emailButtonCTA: Click here to send me an email

body.strategy: “If I had eight hours to chop down a tree, I'd spend six sharpening my axe.”
